title: GET_PLAYER_TIME_ONLINE
content:
0x67D2E605// GetPlayerTimeOnline
int GET_PLAYER_TIME_ONLINE(char* playerSrc);Parameters:playerSrc: A player.Returns: The current time online in seconds.Gets the current time online for a specified player.Examples:Lualocal function ShowTimeOnline()
    local player = source
    local secondsTotalOnline = GetPlayerTimeOnline(player)

    print(("Time online : %f H %f min %f"):format(
        (secondsTotalOnline / 3600),
        ((secondsTotalOnline / 60) % 60),
        (secondsTotalOnline % 60)
    ))
end

RegisterNetEvent("myTimeOnline", ShowTimeOnline)
codeBlocks:
local function ShowTimeOnline()
    local player = source
    local secondsTotalOnline = GetPlayerTimeOnline(player)

        (secondsTotalOnline / 3600),
        ((secondsTotalOnline / 60) % 60),
        (secondsTotalOnline % 60)
    ))
end

RegisterNetEvent("myTimeOnline", ShowTimeOnline)
